page-open-deposit-contract-address-capti: We've added spaces to make the address easier to read
page-open-deposit-contract-checkbox1: I’ve already used the launchpad to set up my  validator.
page-open-deposit-contract-checkbox2: I understand that I need to use the launchpad to stake. Simple transfers to this address won’t work.
page-open-deposit-contract-checkbox3: I'm going to check the deposit contract address with other sources.
page-open-deposit-contract-h2: This is not where you stake
page-open-deposit-contract-meta-desc: Verify the deposit contract address for  staking.
page-open-deposit-contract-staking: To stake your BTO in  you must use the dedicated launchpad product and follow the instructions. Sending BTO to the address on this page will not make you a staker and will result in a failed transaction.
page-open-deposit-contract-staking-check: We expect there to be a lot of fake addresses and scams out there. To be safe, check the staking address you're using against the address on this page. We recommend checking it with other trustworthy sources too.
page-open-deposit-contract-subtitle: This is the address for the staking contract. Use this page to confirm you’re sending funds to the correct address when you stake.
page-open-deposit-contract-warning-2: Sending funds to this address won’t work and won’t make you a staker. You must follow the launchpad instructions.
